text: Don't wait until October to check out this spooky horror anthology. Each six-episode season (of which there are three so far) tells a story from the darkest pages of the internet. While the show may be based on a new creepypasta each year, it is so much more than just a retelling of a scary story: It's also a show about the darkness within all of us, and explores complex themes like forgiveness, grief, and mental health.The next season, Channel Zero: The Dream Door, is rumored to hit SyFy next year, so get your fill of the first three installments now. All episodes are available to watch on SyFy's website.
